Package com.company

Class Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Translator

  • public class Translator
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the parsing of the memory image and writing to files.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Translator

        public Translator​(java.lang.String filePath,
                  java.lang.String fileName,
                  java.lang.String noisy,
                  java.lang.String hex)
        Constructor for the Translator class.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file ie. /home/user/folder
        fileName - the name of the file ie. code.txt, code.o
        noisy - tells me whether I should print register changes
        hex - tells me how to display memory

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save​()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the memory and simulation to two separate files. The two files are mem"file" and sim"file"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if writing fails

      • reset

        public void reset​()
        Resets the memory to original state before the simulator started

      • setInstructions

        void setInstructions​()
        Sets the record of assembly Instructions that the program can work with.

      • readMemFile

        void readMemFile​()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads and calls the parse method on the memory image. Sets the memory back up when finished. Creates the Cpu when finished.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading fails

      • parseMem

        private void parseMem​(java.lang.String memLine)
        Parses the given line for bytes or simulator parameters.
        Parameters:
        memLine - the line being parsed

      • retreiveMemImage

        public java.lang.String retreiveMemImage​()
        Gets a string representation of the memory.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the memory.

        public Cpu sendCpu​()
